name: Plushie Panic
description:
The Plushie are attacking!

You need to survive as long as possible by throwing pillows on them!

However, as expected from a soft pillow, they don't quite pack a punch. But the Plushie themselves seem to pack quite a lot......

This game was made for the Buddy Up Winter 2023 Jam.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Controls

WASD to move

Left-click to throw pillow

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Credits

Developer: Normkoto

Made with: Godot Engine

Assets Used:-
